text: Noordzijde is a village in the Dutch province of South Holland. It is a part of the municipality of Bodegraven, and lies about 7 km west of Woerden. The statistical area "Noordzijde", which also can include the surrounding countryside, has a population of around 320.Statistics Netherlands (CBS), Statline: Kerncijfers wijken en buurten 2003-2005. As of 1 January 2005. ==References== Category:Populated places in South Holland
title: Noordzijde
